metadata.name: Regsvr32 DLL Execution With Suspicious File Extension
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of REGSVR32.exe with DLL files masquerading as other files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\regsvr32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('regsvr32.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bin')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bmp')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cr2')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dat')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.eps')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.gif')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ico')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpeg')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpg')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.nef')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.orf')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.png')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.raw')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.sr2')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.temp')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.tif')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.tiff')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.tmp')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.rtf')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.txt'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of REGSVR32.exe with DLL files masquerading as other files
